body.name: Smart Watch 2023 (Call Receive/Dial) Fitness Tracker Compatible iPhone and Android, 1.7" Full Touch Screen Heart Rate Sleep Blood Pressure Monitor, IP67 Waterproof Digital Watch for Women Men-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 29 mins
features: 【Call Receiving/ Dialing & Read Message】This smart watch is equipped with a high-quality speaker, after connecting to Bluetooth, can directly use the watch to answer make calls/play music/read messages/store contacts/view call history. Bluetooth 5.0 (supports Android 4.4, IOS9.0 and above), allows you to exercise, fitness, and bike hands-free, you will never miss any calls & message during meetings or workout. If you don’t need the call function, you can turn it off.

【1.7" Large Screen & 100+ Watch Faces】This fitness smart watch with receiving dial function has a 1.7-inch high-definition full rounded touch screen. Five levels Brightness options allow you to easily read in the sun or in the dark. We have carefully designed beautiful UI and more than 100 watch faces for you, allowing you to switch watch face styles through the App (Da fit) at any time according to your mood and occasion.

【All-day Health Monitoring】This activity tracker smart watch with receiving/ dial function can detect your blood pressure and heart rate. You can enable 24-hour heart rate detection in the APP. The high-performance motion sensor monitors sleep status (deep sleep, light sleep and wake-up time) and provides comprehensive sleep quality analysis. With this fitness watch for men women, you can have a healthier, more active life.

【IP67 Waterproof & Long Last Time】The waterproof smart watch meets the IP67 waterproof standard. You can wear it while washing your hands, running in the rain or even swimming. (Do not let the watch soak in sea water and hot water, such as hot springs, etc.) This sports activity watch is equipped with a 230 mAh large-capacity battery, equipped with a fast charge charger, which can be used for 3-6 days when fully charged, and the standby time is over 30 days.

【Multifunctional & Broad Compatibility】Our smart watch for android iOS phone has many features like, weather information, music playback/control, camera control, alarm clock, stopwatch, breathing training, game. It can support most android and iOS phones, (supports Android 4.4, IOS9.0 and above). If your have any problem, please feel free to contact our customer service via your amazon account.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart Watch for Android iOS Phones(Bluetooth Answer/Make Call), 1.7” HD Touchscreen Fitness Sports Watches for Men Women

The smartwatches adopt a new generation of intelligent upgrade chip, whose intelligent algorithm is more efficient and the browsing speed is faster. Because it is equipped with a high-precision thermal conductivity temperature sensor, the monitoring data is more accurate. With a large high-definition display, ultra-high pixel resolution, the display effect is clearer. With dual-mode Bluetooth, it has more functions and stronger practicability. The new high-end CPU achieves lower power consumption. The smart watches are compatible with smartphones with iOS 9.0 & Android 4.4 or higher.

Weather Display When the watch is connected with app, choose the city you live and the weather on the watch will update every hour. Music Control Control your music and switch songs easily with your smartwatch, no need to take your phone out of your pocket. Camera Shutter Just open the ‘’Da Fit‘’ App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Great Value.!!! Love the watch.!!!Aside from all the cool monitoring that this watch does … (Heart rate – Sleep stats – Blood pressure – ETC.)… I really love the Smart phone actions of making and answering calls, text messaging and music controls. I work at a golf course and we are not allowed to have our phones out and this watch really does the trick. I also love the many different watch faces available. I have mine on a very large digital face and I love it. Nice and bright in the daylight. Great App and super easy to pair. Would purchase again.!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with this smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I have had a lot of smart watches, including Samsung and I am very impressed with the quality of this smart watch and all the functions for the price. The design is cute and it works for daily training.If you are thinking about a gift for this christmass definitely this is a good one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch with little instructions
reviews.reviewText: There are nice features but it does not come with detailed instructions. I know I am not utilizing all it can do but I don't know how to access it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Id give it no stars if i could. The worst watch I've bought. I really wish I would have just sent it back. I couldn't get it to work on my galaxy 21+ so I figured I'd save it for my little girls phone. Is a samsung brand as well and nope. My oldest daughter got one for Christmas with the other one for my youngest daughter and she has an iPhone, will not work with it either so it's basically useless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for IPhone and just as good!
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy to program and looks great. Has just about all the functions as an Apple Watch at a fraction of the price. The health apps for monitoring BP, HR and O2 Sat are pretty accurate and I love all the different things in the app to discover about overall health. I will be purchasing more as gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery life poor. Must charge nightly
reviews.reviewText: Liked the performance. Liked most abilities of this phone. Can't figure out how to keep the display on 24/7, but battery life is so poor, this might not even be a good option. Be prepared to charge nightly. This is the biggest drawback. Otherwise, a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing features for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love all the features this watch has. Everything works as it should and it's easy to work. Pulse and SpO2 are accurate. Blood pressure reads a bit low, but it's close enough. Call quality through the watch is actually pretty good! The display is bright, touch response is good, and the battery seems to last. The only thing I'd change is the phone app. It's a bit clunky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars inexpensive watch does the wonder. no more expensive apple watch.
reviews.reviewText: This watch is well built, and feels like expensive apple watch.It can do a number of things, blood pressure, heart rates, etc.Can use it as fitness watch to track your activities.Accept calls, etc.On the first time we set up, media audio was set to the watch by accident. You can set it using Bluetooth setting for the watch to only accept audio on the calls.Five Start.
